title: My LoL Launcher won't open/function

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
hello guys, whenever i open my league shortcut on the desktop. 
it won't work. it always stop as the picture shows.
i re-install it thousand times and also try to re-install microsoft framework 3.5 many times too
i can play lol on my laptop, it works successfully. but i cant play it on my PC, the screen is all black!!
somebody help me!!!

replies.body:
It seems like you may be experiencing an *unstable connection* to many of the platform services League uses. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your next step, to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League. 

If you still experience this after taking those steps, let me know. ^.^

hi
i discovered that if i just open lol launcher and do nothing
hours later it will show a small screen and say BugSplatRC resource DLL not found
still dont know what happened...

Oooh, thanks for that bit of context, because I'm familiar with that error and the fix. You should be able to resolve this by grabbing our Hextech Repair Tool and running the Repatch feature by checking the *Force Repatch* box. then hitting **START**. After the process finishes, launch league as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file inside the League install directory (**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**).

Let me know if this caused any change!

hello, I tried the  Hextech Repair Tool but whenever I choose to FORCE REPATCH,  Hextech Repair Tool will crash.
If i check the other box such as Gather System & LoL logs,  Hextech Repair Tool can run normally.
sooooooo baddddddddd....

At this point, I'd recommend taking the logs from the HRT and attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can continue troubleshooting this issue with you.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I tried every solutions in connection guide and re-install java too. but it still remains the same status as the picture shows
since my laptop uses the same internet, i don't think the problem is from connection
still thanks for your help
if you have come up with other solutions, please let me know
